name: Polybius - The Lost Arcade Game
description:
Polybius is an urban legend about an arcade game that caused numerous affects on those who played it, such as night terrors, insomnia, amnesia, and hallucinations. This game is my own interpretation of how the game played if the stories are true.

I do not own Polybius in any shape or form,  credit goes to the individual who created the urban legend.

Controls:

Arrow keys to change position

Z to shoot

SFX from freesound.org

Chiptune sounds created with bfxr
